column1: 1979LPSC...10..531N|1979|A summary of the petrology and geochemistry of pristine highlands rocks.|Norman
column4: G.|Lunar and Planetary Science Conference Proceedings|1||531|The petrology and geochemistry of pristine lunar highlands rock samples consisting of ferroan anorthosites
column10: petrographic and chemical evidence is presented which shows that low-siderophile rocks are the result of endogenous igneous activity and not impact melt differentiation. For example
column11: these rocks contain Fe-metal as a late-crystallizing phase
column12: and have W/La ratios higher than polymict breccias.|
